ValidationRule.description: Ensures that only certain roles can be specified as primary member. At the time of writing, primary members can only be advice clients or mortgage borrowers.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: !$Setup.SystemConfiguration__c.ValidationBypass__c && FinServ__Primary__c && NOT(INCLUDES( Roles, "Client") || INCLUDES( Roles, "Mortgage borrower"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A primary member can only be a client or mortgage borrower
